content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is the function to achieve this in Julia:

```julia
function wrap_string(s, text_width = 10)
    words = split(s, " ")
    output = ""
    line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(line * " " * word) > text_width
            output *= "\n"
            append!(output, line)
            line = ""
        end
        
        line *= word * " "
    end
    
    output *= "\n"
    append!(output, line)
    
    return output
end
```
You can use this function as follows:

```julia
s = "This is a sample text. This text will be wrapped into lines."
print(wrap_string(s))
```
